briefTitle: Coadministration of Ezetimibe and Simvastatin in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia (P05457)
officialTitle: Open-label, Long-term Study of Coadministration of Ezetimibe and Simvastatin in Patients With Primary Hypercholesterolemia Who Have Not Reached LDL-cholesterol Target With HMG-CoA Reductase Inhibitors
summary: Evaluate the safety of the long-term (1 year) coadministration of ezetimibe and simvastatin in patients with hypercholesterolemia who have not reached low density lipoprotein (LDL)-cholesterol target with 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A (HMG-CoA) reductase inhibitors.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events and Adverse Reactions
